China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 21 日星期三 07:20:00 GMT 120
China's childcare costs among highest in world, think tank saysChina is one of the world's most expensive places to raise a child, relative to its GDP per capita, a prominent Chinese think tank said on Wednesday as it detailed the time and opportunity costs for women who opt to have children in the country. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:58:42 GMT WQJBUYNEZRJCNNIXEGKVFAERSM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-childcare-costs-among-highest-world-think-tank-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中国
Australia loses out as Chinese tourists flock to Southeast AsiaAs Chinese tourism booms to visa-free countries in Southeast Asia, Australia is losing out, with more cost-conscious mainland travellers also choosing cheaper destinations closer to home, according to tour operators and industry data. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:13:54 GMT RGKC3IAQPJJHLDF5IBYDEQZGGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-loses-out-chinese-tourists-flock-southeast-asia-2024-02-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
Rise of fast-fashion Shein, Temu roils global air cargo industryThe rapid rise of fast-fashion e-commerce retailers such as Shein and Temu is upending the global air cargo industry, as they increasingly vie for limited air-cargo space to woo consumers with rapid transit times, more than ten industry sources said. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:05:17 GMT TGEYXFYYZ5JBVJZRQFJGPGA2W4 https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/rise-fast-fashion-shein-temu-roils-global-air-cargo-industry-2024-02-21/Arriana McLymore, Casey Hall, Lisa Barrington商业零售与消费品
Chinese banks approve $17 bln of loans under 'whitelist' project - housing authorityChina's housing authority said 123.6 billion yuan ($17.20 billion) of development loans have been approved and 29.4 billion yuan have been issued under a special mechanism aimed at injecting liquidity into the crisis-hit property sector. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 05:05:29 GMT DQ4QWBDIRJL53ICMKO3ZGK7II4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-banks-approve-17-bln-loans-under-whitelist-project-housing-authority-2024-02-21/Reuters世界中国
Chinese capital closes highways after heavy snowfallAuthorities in Beijing shut some highways on Wednesday after heavier-than-expected snowfall hit the Chinese capital, part of a cold spell sweeping many parts of the country this week. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 04:38:35 GMT OMCIYA7H4JID5JMXTBKHF74PIA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/beijing-shuts-highways-after-heavy-snowfall-2024-02-21/Liz Lee, Alessandro Diviggiano商业环境
HSBC's $3 bln China writedown mars record annual profitHSBC Holdings reported a record annual profit, that nonetheless came in below analysts' forecasts as the income boost from higher interest rates was offset by a hefty $3 billion charge from its stake in a Chinese bank. Wed, 21 Feb 2024 04:19:32 GMT 65HY677SVVJPLE7FHNCHHMTURY https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/hsbc-full-year-profit-jumps-78-trailing-estimate-2024-02-21/Selena Li, Lawrence White商业金融
